content: I apologize for the inconvenience, but we detected our ListServ is having issues keeping up with volume of mail and is currently working through a significant amount of mailings. We are working on the issue. You may have received a duplicate ListServ communication from one of the lists you are a member. We hope to resolve the issue soon and the back log of emails will go out within 24hrs. Thank you for your patience. Eric@Hl7.org

The HL7 ListServ system is back to functioning properly. I apologize if you received duplicate emails from the system. This issue is now resolved.
Eric Schmitt
